name: connected
info:
Handles tuya device status changes.


Processes the status of a real device , if the connection status changes:
   - Creates a log msg (deviceId, "_connected", true/false) for standard processing
 
IMPORTANT: set the ** deviceID ** parameter with the correct ID value.

name: device connected message

label: tuyaDAEMON.custom.PM detector
info:
**custom device PM detector

To use a USB-serial PM detector with tuyaDAEMON.

name: pick and execute
